mapper.insert: insert into bbs_t (b_idx, subject,writer, content, f_name, pwd, write_date, hit) values(bbs_t_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{f_name}, #{pwd}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update bbs_t set hit = hit + 1 where b_idx = #{b_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into comment_t (c_idx, writer, content, b_idx) values(COMMENT_T_SEQ.nextval, #{writer}, #{content},#{b_idx})
